trans-unit.source: Provides change monitoring for SQL Server databases.
trans-unit.target: SQL Server 데이터베이스에 대 한 변경 모니터링을 제공 합니다.
이 클래스는 상속 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The SqlChangeMonitor class wraps the ADO.NET <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> class and adds change monitoring for SQL Server-based dependencies.
trans-unit.target: SqlChangeMonitor 클래스 래핑합니다 ADO.NET <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>클래스 및 SQL Server 기반 종속성에 대 한 변경 모니터링을 추가 합니다.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the SqlChangeMonitor class serves as a bridge between the ADO.NET <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> object and the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 SqlChangeMonitor 클래스 다리 역할을 ADO.NET 사이의 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>개체 및 <xref:System.Runtime.Caching>네임 스페이스.</xref:System.Runtime.Caching> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor"></xref> class.

The SqlChangeMonitor method binds the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange> event of the object in `dependency` to the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ChangeMonitor.OnChanged%2A> method handler.
trans-unit.target: SqlChangeMonitor 메서드를 바인딩하는 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange>에 있는 개체의 이벤트 `dependency` 에 <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ChangeMonitor.OnChanged%2A>메서드 처리기.</xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ChangeMonitor.OnChanged%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange>

trans-unit.source: This enables the change monitor to receive notification of changes in SQL Server databases.
trans-unit.target: 이 통해 SQL Server 데이터베이스에 대 한 변경 알림을 수신 하는 변경 모니터입니다.

trans-unit.source: When you invoke the SqlChangeMonitor constructor, you must pass a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 전달 해야 SqlChangeMonitor 생성자를 호출할 때는 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>개체를 매개 변수로.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> object, you must pass a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> parameter to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 만들 때 한 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>개체를 전달 해야 합니다는 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>생성자에 매개 변수.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>

trans-unit.source: The constructor for <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> class lets you specify optional information for configuring the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> instance.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 생성자 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>클래스를 사용 하면 구성에 대 한 선택적 정보를 지정할 수는 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>인스턴스.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents an ADO.NET <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref> object.
Gets an identifier for a <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 식별자를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor"> </xref> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor> class generates a GUID for this property.
An identifier for the change monitor.
